title: WTB: The Following T206 HOFers - Graded

posts.post_title: WTB: The Following T206 HOFers - Graded
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase the following T206 HOFers in SGC50 or better (NO PSA Please!):

Mordecai Brown, Cubs on Shirt
Mordecai Brown, Portrait
Frank Chance, Red Portrait
Jack Chesbro
Fred Clarke, Portrait

I'm very motivated to buy these now, so please let me know what you have and your asking price.

Thanks for looking!
Phil

2 Week Bump.........
